sentences.sentence: Lilies and jasmines surge up on the crest of the waves of light.
sentences.translation: 百合与茉莉在光波的浪花上翻涌。

sentences.sentence: Yet my memory is still sweet with the first jasmines that I held in my hand when I was a child.
sentences.translation: 然而，我的记忆仍然因为那第一束白色茉莉而芬芳，那时我还是一个孩子，我将它紧紧捧在手心。

sentences.sentence: Yet my memory is still sweet with the first white jasmines that I held in my hand when I was a child.
sentences.translation: 哄然而，我的记忆仍然因为那第一束白色茉莉而芬芳，那时我还是一个孩子，我将它紧紧捧在手心。
